review_title: Ok but stuck in the past
job_title: Administration in Swindon, Wiltshire, South West England, England
pros: Good hours of work Costa on site semi interesting work
cons: Paid parking Rubbish transport links Hospital not using up to date systems which makes the job harder Cliquey team Canteen not big enough and shared with the public meaning you wait ages for food on your 30 min break No flexibility Bad culture between clinical and admin, fueled by middle management who are insignificant and think they are important. Discrimination against anyone who isnt a white English straight female. I am not English and i was reminded of this daily. Still a brit and was definitely a diversity hire.

job_title: Registered Nurse in Swindon, Wiltshire, South West England, England
pros: Lots of training opportunities, a great chief executive and a senior team who are working very hard
cons: Unfortunately, it is the same old story; NHS is rife with bullies, and GWH is no exception. Depending on where you work, you can have a very fulfilling career, but this is not the case in every department.

pros: I now have a supportive boss, as I have mental health issues and absences because of this. However I have taken up more responsibility with health and safety, and I am going to do the specialist portfolio, all with my boss's support.
